name: 2021 Royal Enfield Himalayan
description: A budget-conscious dual sport built in Bangladesh.

name: 2021 Yamaha XSR900
description: The neo-retro version of the MT-09 adds more than cool looks to the mix.

name: 2021 Yamaha MT-03
description: The smallest MT model packs big fun in a very approachable package.

name: 2021 Yamaha XSR700
description: The retro classic version of the MT-07 continues its successful run.

name: 2021 Suzuki SV650/X/ABS
description: Suzuki’s long-popular V-twin middleweight continues in three versions.

name: 2021 Suzuki GSX-S750Z
description: Suzuki offers a major bang-for-the-buck deal in the GSX-S750Z.

name: 2021 Yamaha YZF-R3
description: Yamaha’s entry-level R model packs serious supersport fun on a budget.

name: 2021 Harley-Davidson Street Bob 114
description: Still lean but a bit meaner, with a bigger engine as standard this year.
